Text:
I have all series/seasons of Beauty and the Geek US, UK, and Australia.  Is there any interest in a repackage of all of them in one torrent?

If so should I keep files in tact, or re-encode to MP4 to reduce filesize/download and increase device compatibility, but it would also have slightly reduced quality.
thanks for this up - love this show up in California!
Are you sure this is Season 3? I thought Season 3 was airing at the minute...
